duties_responsibilities.duty: Plan, create, and maintain high-quality documentation for continuous improvement projects and product launches with a focus on self-service strategies and author education.
Define customer and employee use cases and processes for new or changing products and businesses.
Drive content projects from scoping through post-launch measurement using data analysis and content audits to deliver quality content.
Develop and execute strategies to improve content quality, maintainability, and usability.
Define, manage, and communicate content effectiveness metrics and evangelize internal content writing standards.
Improve content development workflow and team processes to increase efficiency and quality.
Build effective relationships with cross-functional stakeholders to deliver complex, global projects.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor's degree in English, Communications, Technical Writing, or related field (Master's preferred)
